title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Sales volume in millions, with a total of 15 data points.
Overall Sales volume in millions has increased over the Year
Sales volume in millions is rapidly increasing from 2004 to 2008, and lastly roughly constant from 2008 to 2018.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2007 and 2008.
Max Sales volume in millions about 16.17 was recorded at Year 2016
Min Sales volume in millions about 2.03 was recorded at Year 2004
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Sales volume in millions, with a total of 15 data points. The chart has 5 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2004 to 2008.
Also, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2013 to 2016.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2010 to 2013.
Similarly, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2016 to 2018.
Conversely, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2008 to 2010.
